% DEFINE DOCUMENT CLASS
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
\documentclass[
  $if(size)$$size$$else$24pt$endif$,
  $if(paper)$$paper$$else$a0paper$endif$,
  $if(orientation)$$orientation$$else$portrait$endif$,
  $if(margin)$$margin$$else$margin=0mm$endif$,
  $if(innermargin)$$innermargin$$else$innermargin=15mm$endif$,
  $if(blockverticalspace)$$blockverticalspace$$else$blockverticalspace=15mm$endif$,
  $if(colspace)$$colspace$$else$colspace=15mm$endif$,
  $if(subcolspace)$$subcolspace$$else$subcolspace=8mm,$endif$ 
]{tikzposter} %Default values for poster format options.



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% PACKAGES, COMMANDS AND DEFINITIONS
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
\usepackage[$if(inputenc)$$inputenc$$else$utf8$endif$]{inputenc}
\usepackage[$if(fontenc)$$fontenc$$else$T1$endif$]{fontenc}
\usepackage{amsbsy} % bold math symbols
\usepackage{kpfonts}
\usepackage{soul}
\usepackage{copyrightbox}
\usepackage{amsmath,amsthm,amssymb,stmaryrd,pifont,wasysym}
\usepackage{url}
% \usepackage{hyperref} % hyper references
% \usefonttheme[onlymath]{serif} % article font style

$if(fontfamily)$
    \usepackage[$for(fontfamilyoptions)$$fontfamilyoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$fontfamily$}
$else$
    % \usepackage{lmodern}
    \usepackage{helvet}
$endif$
\renewcommand{\familydefault}{\sfdefault}
$if(mainfont)$
  \setmainfont[$for(mainfontoptions)$$mainfontoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$mainfont$}
$endif$
$if(sansfont)$
  \setsansfont[$for(sansfontoptions)$$sansfontoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$sansfont$}
$endif$
$if(monofont)$
  \setmonofont[$for(monofontoptions)$$monofontoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$monofont$}
$endif$
$for(fontfamilies)$
  \newfontfamily{$fontfamilies.name$}[$for(fontfamilies.options)$$fontfamilies.options$$sep$,$endfor$]{$fontfamilies.font$}
$endfor$
$if(mathfont)$
    $if(mathspec)$
        \ifXeTeX
            \setmathfont(Digits,Latin,Greek)[$for(mathfontoptions)$$mathfontoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$mathfont$}
        \else
            \setmathfont[$for(mathfontoptions)$$mathfontoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$mathfont$}
        \fi
    $else$
        \setmathfont[$for(mathfontoptions)$$mathfontoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{$mathfont$}
    $endif$
$endif$

% Floats and graphics
\usepackage{morefloats}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{placeins}
\usepackage{graphicx}
%\usepackage{subcaption}
%\usepackage{subfigure}

% Pgfplots
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.18}

% Tikz
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{shadows}
\usetikzlibrary{
  calc,
  matrix,
  chains,
  positioning,
  decorations.pathreplacing,
  arrows,shapes,
  arrows.meta,
  fit
}
\AtBeginEnvironment{tikzpicture}{\tracinglostchars=0\relax}

% Commands
\newcommand{\bs}{\textbackslash}   % backslash
\newcommand{\cmd}[1]{{\bf \color{red}#1}}   % highlights command
\newcommand\subtitle[1]{{\Large\color{subtitlegray}\selectfont
    \textbf{#1}}}

\definecolor{authorColor}{rgb}{0.6,0.6,0.6}
\definecolor{subtitlegray}{rgb}{0.3,0.3,0.3}

\def\url#1{\expandafter\string\csname #1\endcsname}



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% DEFINE SETTINGS
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
$if(title)$
  \title{
    \begin{minipage}{1.5\linewidth}
      $title$
    \end{minipage}
  }
$endif$

$if(subtitle)$
  \subtitle{$subtitle$}
$endif$

$if(author)$
  \author{
    \begin{minipage}{1.5\linewidth}
      $for(author)$$author$$sep$, $endfor$
    \end{minipage}
  }
$endif$

$if(institute)$
  \institute{$for(institute)$$institute$$sep$ \and $endfor$}
$endif$

$if(date)$
  \date{$date$}
$endif$



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% DEFINE G-SCOP THEMES
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
$if(background)$
    \newcommand\argum{$background$} % defines the title style
$else$
    \newcommand\argum{gscop} % defines the title style
$endif$

\newcommand\condgscop{gscop} % for comparison
\newcommand\condgscopgael{gscop-gael} % for comparison

\ifx\argum\condgscop
\definebackgroundstyle{gscop}{
  \node[above right,inner sep=0pt,outer sep=0pt] at (bottomleft) {\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{./backgrounds/background_gscop.png}};
}
\fi
\ifx\argum\condgscopgael
\definebackgroundstyle{gscop}{
  \node[above right,inner sep=0pt,outer sep=0pt] at (bottomleft) {\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{./backgrounds/background_gscop-gael.png}};
}
\fi

\definetitlestyle{gscop}{%%%%%%%%%%%% CHANGE WIDTH TO REPOSITION TEXT TITLE
    width=353mm, roundedcorners=0, linewidth=0pt, innersep=8mm,
    titletotopverticalspace=40mm, titletoblockverticalspace=0mm, titletextscale=1
}{}

\definecolor{titleBlue}{rgb}{0.0,0.6,0.9}
\definecolorstyle{gscop} {
    \definecolor{colorOne}{named}{red}
    \definecolor{colorTwo}{named}{yellow}
    \definecolor{colorThree}{named}{cyan}
}{
    % Background Colors
    \colorlet{backgroundcolor}{white}
    \colorlet{framecolor}{white}
    % Title Colors
    \colorlet{titlefgcolor}{titleBlue}
    \colorlet{titlebgcolor}{white}
    % Block Colors
    \colorlet{blocktitlebgcolor}{colorThree}
    \colorlet{blocktitlefgcolor}{titleBlue}
    \colorlet{blockbodybgcolor}{white}
    \colorlet{blockbodyfgcolor}{black!80}
    % Innerblock Colors
    \colorlet{innerblocktitlebgcolor}{white}
    \colorlet{innerblocktitlefgcolor}{black}
    \colorlet{innerblockbodybgcolor}{colorThree}
    \colorlet{innerblockbodyfgcolor}{black}
    % Note colors
    \colorlet{notefgcolor}{black}
    \colorlet{notebgcolor}{colorTwo}
    \colorlet{noteframecolor}{colorTwo}
}

\defineblockstyle{gscop}{
    titlewidthscale=1, bodywidthscale=1,titleleft,
    titleoffsetx=0pt, titleoffsety=5mm, bodyoffsetx=0mm, bodyoffsety=15mm,
    bodyverticalshift=15mm, roundedcorners=5, linewidth=10pt,
    titleinnersep=10mm, bodyinnersep=2.2cm
}{
    \draw[color=framecolor, fill=blockbodybgcolor,draw=gray!50, line width=1mm, drop shadow] (blockbody.south west)
    rectangle (blockbody.north east);
}
 
\definelayouttheme{gscop}{
    \usecolorstyle{gscop}
    \usebackgroundstyle{gscop}
    \usetitlestyle{gscop}
    \useblockstyle{gscop}
    %\useinnerblockstyle{sample}%aAvoid unknown type error
}



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% USE GSCOP THEME
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
\usetheme{gscop}



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% COLORED BOXES DEFINITION
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
\makeatletter
\setlength{\TP@visibletextwidth}{\textwidth-10cm}
\makeatother

\usepackage{tcolorbox}

\newtcolorbox{redbox}[1]{
  colback=red!5!white,colframe=red!75!black,fonttitle=\bfseries,title={\large #1}
}{}
\newtcolorbox{greenbox}[1]{
  colback=green!5!white,colframe=green!55!black,fonttitle=\bfseries,title={\large #1}
}
\newtcolorbox{bluebox}[1]{
  colback=blue!5!white,colframe=blue!65!black,fonttitle=\bfseries,title={\large #1}
}



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% BABEL AND LANGUAGES
%-----------------------------------------------------------------

$if(lang)$
  \ifLuaTeX
  \usepackage[bidi=basic]{babel}
  \else
  \usepackage[bidi=default]{babel}
  \fi
  $if(babel-lang)$
    \babelprovide[main,import]{$babel-lang$}
  $endif$
  $for(babel-otherlangs)$
    \babelprovide[import]{$babel-otherlangs$}
  $endfor$
  % get rid of language-specific shorthands (see #6817):
  \let\LanguageShortHands\languageshorthands
  \def\languageshorthands#1{}
$endif$



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% BIBLIOGRAPHY
%-----------------------------------------------------------------

\newif\ifbibliography

$if(csl-refs)$
  \newlength{\cslhangindent}
  \setlength{\cslhangindent}{1.5em}
  \newlength{\csllabelwidth}
  \setlength{\csllabelwidth}{3em}
  \newlength{\cslentryspacingunit} % times entry-spacing
  \setlength{\cslentryspacingunit}{\parskip}
  \newenvironment{CSLReferences}[2] % #1 hanging-ident, #2 entry spacing
  {% don't indent paragraphs
    \setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
    % turn on hanging indent if param 1 is 1
    \ifodd #1
    \let\oldpar\par
    \def\par{\hangindent=\cslhangindent\oldpar}
    \fi
    % set entry spacing
    \setlength{\parskip}{#2\cslentryspacingunit}
  }{}
  \usepackage{calc}
  \newcommand{\CSLBlock}[1]{#1\hfill\break}
  \newcommand{\CSLLeftMargin}[1]{\parbox[t]{\csllabelwidth}{#1}}
  \newcommand{\CSLRightInline}[1]{\parbox[t]{\linewidth - \csllabelwidth}{#1}\break}
  \newcommand{\CSLIndent}[1]{\hspace{\cslhangindent}#1}
$endif$

$if(natbib)$
  \usepackage[$natbiboptions$]{natbib}
  \usepackage{bibentry}
  \bibliographystyle{$if(biblio-style)$$biblio-style$$else$abbrvnat$endif$}
$endif$

$if(biblatex)$
  \usepackage[$if(biblio-style)$style=$biblio-style$,$endif$$for(biblatexoptions)$$biblatexoptions$$sep$,$endfor$]{biblatex}
  $for(bibliography)$
    \addbibresource{$bibliography$}
  $endfor$
$endif$

$if(nocite-ids)$
  \nocite{$for(nocite-ids)$$it$$sep$, $endfor$}
$endif$



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
$if(header-includes)$
  $for(header-includes)$
    $header-includes$
  $endfor$
$endif$



%-----------------------------------------------------------------
% MAIN PART
%-----------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{document}

\maketitle 

$if(abstract)$
  \block[bodyoffsety=4cm]{Abstract}{ 
    $abstract$
    \vspace{1cm}

    $if(keywords)$
    \textbf{Keywords: } $for(keywords)$\textit{$keywords$}$sep$, $endfor$
    $endif$
  }
$elseif(keywords)$
  \block[bodyoffsety=4cm]{Keywords}{ 
    $for(keywords)$$keywords$$sep$, $endfor$
  }
$endif$

$if(separateref)$
$else$
    $if(bibliography)$
    %\printbibliography[heading=none]
    \nobibliography{$bibliography$} % use alongside wit \bibentry
    $endif$
$endif$

$body$

$if(separateref)$
  $if(natbib)$
      $if(bibliography)$
          \renewcommand\bibname{}
          \renewcommand\refname{}
          \block[bodyoffsety=4cm]{$biblio-title$}{
            \bibliographytrue
            \bibliography{$for(bibliography)$$bibliography$$sep$,$endfor$}
          }
      $endif$
  $endif$
  $if(biblatex)$
    \block[bodyoffsety=4cm]{$biblio-title$}{
      \bibliographytrue
      \printbibliography[heading=none]
    }
  $endif$
$endif$

$if(include-after)$
  $for(include-after)$
    $include-after$
  $endfor$
$endif$

\end{document}

\endinput
